name: material-gathering-dp

tableSchemas.name: occurrence
tableSchemas.title: Occurrence
tableSchemas.description: Occurrences of dwc:Organisms in place and time.

tableSchemas.name: related-material
tableSchemas.title: RelatedMaterial
tableSchemas.description: MaterialEntities associated with Events (Inventory, MaterialGathering, Occurrence, InteractionOccurrence) or other MaterialEntities.

tableSchemas.name: collection
tableSchemas.title: Collection
tableSchemas.description: Persistent formal repositories in which dwc:MaterialEntities and/or Media are preserved.

tableSchemas.name: genetic-sequence
tableSchemas.title: GeneticSequence
tableSchemas.description: Digital representations of a nucleotide sequences.

tableSchemas.name: geological-context
tableSchemas.title: GeologicalContext
tableSchemas.description: Geological information, such as stratigraphy, that qualifies a region or place.

tableSchemas.name: chronometric-age
tableSchemas.title: ChronometricAge
tableSchemas.description: Approximations of temporal position (in the sense conveyed by https://www.w3.org/TR/owl-time/#time:TemporalPosition) that are supported by evidence.

tableSchemas.name: related-event
tableSchemas.title: RelatedEvent
tableSchemas.description: Actions that occur at some location during some time.

tableSchemas.name: related-identification
tableSchemas.title: RelatedIdentification
tableSchemas.description: Taxonomic determinations (e.g., assignments to dwc:Taxon).

tableSchemas.name: identification-taxon
tableSchemas.title: IdentificationTaxon
tableSchemas.description: The components and positions of dwc:Taxa in an Identifications.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence-media
tableSchemas.title: OccurrenceMedia
tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to Occurrences of dwc:Organisms.

tableSchemas.name: related-material-media
tableSchemas.title: RelatedMaterialMedia
tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to RelatedMaterial.

tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to dwc:GeologicalContexts.

tableSchemas.name: chronometric-age-media

tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to chrono:ChronometricAge determinations.

tableSchemas.name: related-event-media
tableSchemas.title: RelatedEventMedia
tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to RelatedEvents.

tableSchemas.name: related-identification-media
tableSchemas.title: RelatedIdentificationMedia
tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to RelatedIdentifications.

title: Darwin Core Material Gathering Data Package
description: A data package for sharing data on gathered material.
